title: 820-3115 Green Light turn on and then off??
message: I have a 820-3115 with a green charging light that turns on, then turns off, then turns on again?? Has anyone seen this before??

title: 820-3115 Green Light turn on and then off??
820-3115 Green Light turn on and then off??
message:
No, no one at 5am in the morning!
Take some measurements and then come back. Around 6259

title: 820-3115 Green Light turn on and then off??
message: measure resistance between pins 27/28 and pins 17/18 on U7000, with no power applied. also check voltage at CHGR_DCIN, CHGR_ACIN

title: 820-3115 Green Light turn on and then off??
message: Sean, don't make me fly to the west coast and throw something at you. MEASURE!! :)
